title: The Mysterious Map
setting: Aarav's grandfather's dusty attic filled with old trunks
learning_or_struggle: Aarav discovers a map that leads to a hidden treasure

title: The Treasure Hunt Begins
setting: Aarav's neighborhood park with towering trees and chirping birds
learning_or_struggle: Aarav and his friends start following the map clues

title: The Riddle of the Old Oak Tree
setting: The shadowy grove near the old oak tree with twisted branches
learning_or_struggle: Aarav must solve a riddle to move forward on the treasure hunt

title: The Hidden Cave
setting: Aarav's town outskirts with moss-covered rocks and trickling stream
learning_or_struggle: Aarav uncovers a hidden cave where the treasure might be hidden
